languages.text: "Ты прячешься за оправданиями долга, но на деле жаждешь чужих страданий не меньше, чем я. Каково это — знать, что ты и я похожи? М-м, можешь не отвечать — я чувствую твое мучительное бешенство".
"You hide behind duty, but in reality you crave others' suffering as much as I do. How does it feel to know that you and I are alike? No need to answer — I can sense your agonising rage."
languages.original_text: "Ты прячешься за оправданиями долга, но на деле жаждешь чужих страданий не меньше, чем я. Каково это — знать, что ты и я похожи? М-м, можешь не отвечать — я чувствую твое мучительное бешенство".

traits.locale_text: "You hide behind duty, but in reality you crave others' suffering as much as I do. How does it feel to know that you and I are alike? No need to answer — I can sense your agonising rage."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You hide behind duty, but in reality you crave others' suffering as much as I do. How does it feel to know that you and I are alike? No need to answer — I can sense your agonising rage."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “在恪守职责的外表之下，你和我一样渴望享受他人的痛苦。如果我说，我们是同一类人，你对此有何感想？不必回答——我能嗅到你的狂怒。”
languages.original_text: "You hide behind duty, but in reality you crave others' suffering as much as I do. How does it feel to know that you and I are alike? No need to answer — I can sense your agonising rage."

traits.locale_text: “在恪守职责的外表之下，你和我一样渴望享受他人的痛苦。如果我说，我们是同一类人，你对此有何感想？不必回答——我能嗅到你的狂怒。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Sous couvert d'accomplir votre devoir, vous prenez en fait grand plaisir à faire souffrir les autres, tout comme moi. Alors, qu'est-ce que cela vous fait d'apprendre que nous sommes semblables, vous et moi ? Inutile de me répondre : je peux sentir toute l'étendue de votre rage. »
languages.original_text: "You hide behind duty, but in reality you crave others' suffering as much as I do. How does it feel to know that you and I are alike? No need to answer — I can sense your agonising rage."

traits.locale_text: « Sous couvert d'accomplir votre devoir, vous prenez en fait grand plaisir à faire souffrir les autres, tout comme moi. Alors, qu'est-ce que cela vous fait d'apprendre que nous sommes semblables, vous et moi ? Inutile de me répondre : je peux sentir toute l'étendue de votre rage. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr versteckt Euch hinter Eurer Pflicht, doch in Wahrheit giert Ihr ebenso sehr nach anderer Leute leid wie ich. Was ist das für ein Gefühl? Zu wissen, dass wir zwei einander ähneln? Spart Euch Eure Antwort. Ich spüre Eure quälende Wut."
languages.original_text: "You hide behind duty, but in reality you crave others' suffering as much as I do. How does it feel to know that you and I are alike? No need to answer — I can sense your agonising rage."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr versteckt Euch hinter Eurer Pflicht, doch in Wahrheit giert Ihr ebenso sehr nach anderer Leute leid wie ich. Was ist das für ein Gefühl? Zu wissen, dass wir zwei einander ähneln? Spart Euch Eure Antwort. Ich spüre Eure quälende Wut."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「お前は義務という大義名分を掲げているが、実際は俺と同じように他人の苦しみを切望している。お前と俺が似ていると知って、どう思う？いや、答えなくていいーーお前の悶々とした怒りを感じるよ」
languages.original_text: "You hide behind duty, but in reality you crave others' suffering as much as I do. How does it feel to know that you and I are alike? No need to answer — I can sense your agonising rage."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は義務という大義名分を掲げているが、実際は俺と同じように他人の苦しみを切望している。お前と俺が似ていると知って、どう思う？いや、答えなくていいーーお前の悶々とした怒りを感じるよ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Te escondes en tu deber, pero en realidad ansías el sufrimiento ajeno tanto como yo. ¿Qué se siente al descubrir que somos iguales? No hace falta que contestes, puedo sentir tu rabia agónica».
languages.original_text: "You hide behind duty, but in reality you crave others' suffering as much as I do. How does it feel to know that you and I are alike? No need to answer — I can sense your agonising rage."

traits.locale_text: «Te escondes en tu deber, pero en realidad ansías el sufrimiento ajeno tanto como yo. ¿Qué se siente al descubrir que somos iguales? No hace falta que contestes, puedo sentir tu rabia agónica».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "You hide behind duty, but in reality you crave others' suffering as much as I do. How does it feel to know that you and I are alike? No need to answer — I can sense your agonising rage."

languages.text: "Görev kisvesi altında sen de benim kadar başkalarına acı çektirmeye hasretsin. Benzer olduğumuzu öğrenmek nasıl bir duygu? Cevaplamana gerek yok, kahredici öfkeni hissedebiliyorum."
languages.original_text: "You hide behind duty, but in reality you crave others' suffering as much as I do. How does it feel to know that you and I are alike? No need to answer — I can sense your agonising rage."
